'PlayStation Network', often abbreviated as 'PSN', is an online multiplayer
gaming and digital media delivery service provided/run by Sony Computer
Entertainment for use with the PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, and
PlayStation Vita video game consoles. The
PlayStation Network is the video game portion of the Sony Entertainment Network.
